name: Normal
description: Standard Plant/Defuse mode. Teams play multiple rounds on Attack or Defense, then swap sides for the rest.

name: Swiftplay
description: Best-of-nine mode with similar gameplay rules to Unrated, but adapted for shorter match length.

name: Spike Rush
description: Best-of-seven mode where all players start with the same random weapon. Random orbs provide buffs/debuffs.

name: Premier
description: Tournament mode using Competitive rules, focused on top-tier competition with map pick/ban phases.

name: Deathmatch
description: 12-player free-for-all mode to practice gunplay. First to 40 kills or 9 minutes wins.

name: Escalation
description: 5v5 team mode racing through weapon/ability levels. First team to finish level 12 or furthest along in 10 minutes wins.

name: Team Deathmatch
description: 5v5 mode where first team to 100 kills wins. Includes weapon spawners and recovery orbs.
